input.description:
job ID
Numeric ID of the job.

job name
Job name of the job for which this process has been invoked.

job type
Job type of job.

job description [Optional]
Description for the job as entered by the operator.

BL user ID
User who executes or schedules the job.

CI details [Optional]
List of CI Names and Reconciliation IDs of each CI to be associated with the Task.
Sample: <Configuration-Items> <Configuration-Item> <name>Persius1</name> <reconciliation-id>AS0050560C63F2rpytRAn_CoAAWI0A</reconciliation-id> </Configuration-Item> <Configuration-Item> <name>Papillon1</name> <reconciliation-id>AS0050560C63F2L0K0RAX1htAQc5YA</reconciliation-id> </Configuration-Item> <Configuration-Item> <name>ATL-cisco1720-04</name> <reconciliation-id>AG005056B51824Z4EZSQElKeAwo3sB</reconciliation-id> </Configuration-Item> </Configuration-Items>

targets [Optional]
Comma separated list of target names assigned to the given job if BladeLogic could not retrieve the CMDB reconciliation Ids.

schedule ID
schedule ID of the schedule for a given job for which approval is required.

schedule time
Schedule time in case the job has been scheduled to run.
Syntax: EEE MMM dd HH:mm:ss z yyyy

change timing [Optional]
Default Value: No Impact

change ID [Optional]
Change ID assigned to the job.

task ID [Optional]
Task ID assigned to the job.

comments
Comments contain description for the Change Summary field. This input should be less than 100 characters. Extra characters shall be truncated.
Default Value: Operator Initiated Change

risk level [Optional]
Default Value: Risk Level 2

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="(string-length(.)>0 and string-length('${task ID}')>0) or (string-length(.)=0 and string-length('${task ID}')=0)"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">success</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">failure</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="string(.)='failure'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Invalid inputs: Either both Change and Task IDs should be provided or none</xsl:text> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

output.from: bl to ITSM risk level mapping
output.to: bl to ITSM risk level mapping

output.from: bl to ITSM change type mappings
output.to: bl to ITSM change type mappings

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:value-of select="string(number('${epoch date}')+500)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="string-length(.)>0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">List of targets not mapped to CMDB:
</xsl:text> <xsl:call-template name="tokenize"> <xsl:with-param name="targets" select="." /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name="tokenize"> <xsl:param name="targets" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains($targets, ',')"> <xsl:value-of select="substring-before($targets, ',')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> <xsl:call-template name="tokenize"> <xsl:with-param name="targets" select="substring-after($targets, ',')" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="$targets" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="'${success}'='success'"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${success}'='success'"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${user id}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Changes> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//change) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//change" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${change}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Changes> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="string-length(.)>0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">List of targets not mapped to CMDB:
</xsl:text> <xsl:call-template name="tokenize"> <xsl:with-param name="targets" select="." /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name="tokenize"> <xsl:param name="targets" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains($targets, ',')"> <xsl:value-of select="substring-before($targets, ',')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> <xsl:call-template name="tokenize"> <xsl:with-param name="targets" select="substring-after($targets, ',')" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="$targets" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Changes> <xsl:copy-of select="." /> </Changes> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> ${notes} <xsl:if test="string-length(.)>0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- </xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">List of targets not mapped to CMDB:
</xsl:text> <xsl:call-template name="tokenize"> <xsl:with-param name="targets" select="." /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name="tokenize"> <xsl:param name="targets" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains($targets, ',')"> <xsl:value-of select="substring-before($targets, ',')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> <xsl:call-template name="tokenize"> <xsl:with-param name="targets" select="substring-after($targets, ',')" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="$targets" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="'${success}'='success'"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${success}'='success'"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${user id}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Tasks> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//Task) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//Task" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${task}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Tasks> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0">
  <xsl:output indent="no" />
  <xsl:template match="/">
    <value>
      <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Job ID: ${ID}
Job Name: ${name}
Job Type: ${type}
Job Description: ${desc}
Schedule ID: ${schedule ID}
Schedule Time: ${schedule time}</xsl:text>
    </value>
  </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>

</xsl:text> <xsl:call-template name="tokenize"> <xsl:with-param name="targets" select="." /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name="tokenize"> <xsl:param name="targets" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains($targets, ',')"> <xsl:value-of select="substring-before($targets, ',')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> <xsl:call-template name="tokenize"> <xsl:with-param name="targets" select="substring-after($targets, ',')" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="$targets" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0">
  <xsl:output indent="no" />
  <xsl:template match="/">
    <value>
      <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Job ID: ${ID}
Job Name: ${name}
Job Type: ${type}
Job Description: ${desc}
Schedule ID: ${schedule ID}
Schedule Time: ${schedule time}</xsl:text>
    </value>
  </xsl:template>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Tasks> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//task) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//task" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${task}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Tasks> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Tasks> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*" /> <Task> <task-id>${task ID}</task-id> <instance-name>${CI name}</instance-name> </Task> </Tasks> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Tasks /> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:java="java" version="1.0"><xsl:output indent="no" /><xsl:template match="/"><xsl:variable name="dateFormat" select="java:text.SimpleDateFormat.new()"/><xsl:variable name="pattern" select='"EEE MMM dd HH:mm:ss z yyyy"'/> <xsl:variable name="empty" select="java:applyPattern($dateFormat,$pattern)" /><xsl:variable name="passedDate" select="string(.)"/><xsl:variable name="passedDateAsStr" select="java:lang.String.new($passedDate)"/><xsl:variable name="trmStr" select="java:trim($passedDateAsStr)"/><xsl:variable name="dateVal" select="java:parse($dateFormat,$trmStr)"/> <value><xsl:value-of select="java:getTime($dateVal)"/></value></xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:java="java" version="1.0"><xsl:output indent="no" /><xsl:template match="/"><xsl:variable name="dateFormat" select="java:text.SimpleDateFormat.new()"/> <xsl:variable name="pattern" select='"yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"'/><xsl:variable name="empty" select="java:applyPattern($dateFormat,$pattern)"/><xsl:variable name="dateAsLong" select="java:lang.Long.parseLong(number(.))"/><xsl:variable name="passedDate" select="java:util.Date.new($dateAsLong)"/><value><xsl:value-of select="java:format($dateFormat,$passedDate)"/></value></xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:java="java" version="1.0"><xsl:output indent="no" /><xsl:template match="/"><xsl:variable name="dateFormat" select="java:text.SimpleDateFormat.new()"/> <xsl:variable name="pattern" select='"yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"'/><xsl:variable name="empty" select="java:applyPattern($dateFormat,$pattern)"/><xsl:variable name="dateAsLong" select="java:lang.Long.parseLong(number(.))"/><xsl:variable name="passedDate" select="java:util.Date.new($dateAsLong)"/><value><xsl:value-of select="java:format($dateFormat,$passedDate)"/></value></xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0">
  <xsl:output indent="no" />
  <xsl:template match="/">
    <value>
      <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Job ID: ${ID}
Job Name: ${name}
Job Type: ${type}
Job Description: ${desc}
Schedule ID: ${schedule ID}
Schedule Time: ${schedule time}</xsl:text>
    </value>
  </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>

input.from: bl to ITSM risk level mapping

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="string(.)=''">${default risk level}</xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string(.) != ''"> <xsl:value-of select="string(.)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="string(.)=''">${default impact}</xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string(.) != ''"> <xsl:value-of select="string(.)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="string(.)=''">${default urgency}</xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string(.) != ''"> <xsl:value-of select="string(.)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.from: bl to ITSM change type mappings

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="string(.)=''">${default change type}</xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string(.) != ''"> <xsl:value-of select="string(.)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="string-length(.)>0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">List of targets not mapped to CMDB:
</xsl:text> <xsl:call-template name="tokenize"> <xsl:with-param name="targets" select="." /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name="tokenize"> <xsl:param name="targets" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains($targets, ',')"> <xsl:value-of select="substring-before($targets, ',')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> <xsl:call-template name="tokenize"> <xsl:with-param name="targets" select="substring-after($targets, ',')" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="$targets" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Changes> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//change) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//change" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${change}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Changes> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.value: Failed to get task id for updating schedule for change

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet:
<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="string-length(.)>0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">List of targets not mapped to CMDB:
</xsl:text> <xsl:call-template name="tokenize"> <xsl:with-param name="targets" select="." /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name="tokenize"> <xsl:param name="targets" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains($targets, ',')"> <xsl:value-of select="substring-before($targets, ',')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> <xsl:call-template name="tokenize"> <xsl:with-param name="targets" select="substring-after($targets, ',')" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="$targets" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Changes> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//change) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//change" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${change}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Changes> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(.) = 'true'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">In Progress</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Work In Progress</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(.) = 'true'">${remedyforce platfom}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${task platform}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${success status}'='success'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">ITSM ticket updated successfully</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(.)!='success' and string(.)!='failure'"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(.)='true'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">0</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">1</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(.)='success'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">0</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">1</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${success status}'='success'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">ITSM ticket updated successfully</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(.)!='success' and string(.)!='failure'"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(.)='true'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">0</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">1</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(.)='success'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">0</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">1</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: This process creates or updates change based on the presence of a change ticket ID in a given BL Deploy, Batch or NSH job.
